Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Interface ClientStateRemoteInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface ClientStateRemoteInterface extends Remote
Interface of ClientState.

    • pingPong

      boolean pingPong() throws RemoteException
      Method used to check if the server is still running.

      Only used with RMI connection.

      .
      Returns:
      true.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - When the communication with the server fails.

    • newMessageHandler

      void newMessageHandler(ChatMessage message) throws RemoteException
      Method that analyzes message to see if is intended for the public or private chat and calls the proper method via notifier.
      Parameters:
      message - ChatMessage containing the conversation for a Chat.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - In case of error during the rmi connection process.

    • reloadChats

      void reloadChats(ChatController backup) throws RemoteException
      Method to restore all chats via backup.
      Parameters:
      backup - ChatController containing the Server's backup for the chats.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - In case of error during the rmi connection process.
